import-export-web.plugin.name: Import Export Web
import-export-web.home.title: Import/Export Data
import-export-web.home.subtitle: Manage your Strapi data with import and export functionality. Create backups or restore from previous exports.
import-export-web.home.description: Use the tools below to backup your data or restore from a previous backup. This includes all content, configuration, and uploaded files.
import-export-web.home.export.title: Export Data
import-export-web.home.export.descriptio: Create a complete backup of your Strapi instance including all content, configuration, and files.
import-export-web.home.import.title: Import Data
import-export-web.home.import.descriptio: Restore your Strapi instance from a previously exported archive file.
import-export-web.export.title: Export Data
import-export-web.export.subtitle: Download all your Strapi data as an archive
import-export-web.export.description: This will create a complete backup of your Strapi instance including content and configuration.
import-export-web.export.include-files: Include uploaded files in export (may significantly increase file size)
import-export-web.export.success.title: Export successful
import-export-web.export.success.message: Your data has been exported successfully and the download should start automatically.
import-export-web.export.error.title: Export failed
import-export-web.import.title: Import Data
import-export-web.import.subtitle: Upload and restore data from a Strapi archive. By default, uploaded files are skipped for faster import.
import-export-web.import.warning.title: Warning
import-export-web.import.warning.message: This operation will replace all existing data in your Strapi instance. Make sure you have a backup before proceeding.
import-export-web.import.file-hint: Select a .tar.gz file exported from Strapi
import-export-web.import.error.no-file: Please select a file to import
import-export-web.import.success.title: Import successful
import-export-web.import.success.message: Your data has been imported successfully. The application may need to be restarted.
import-export-web.import.skip-assets: Skip uploaded files import (faster, but media files will not be imported)
import-export-web.import.include-files: Include uploaded files in import (may significantly increase import time)
